techmeme.title: Indonesia says Apple can't sell its iPhone 16 in the country yet, despite a deal to build a local production facility, as it hasn't met domestic content rules (Bernadette Christina/Reuters)
Akamai plans to end its CDN services in China on June 30, 2026, saying customers can move to an Akamai CDN outside China or use local providers like Tencent (Simon Sharwood/The Register)
Dublin-based payments startup NomuPay, formed in 2023 from some of Wirecard's regional payment licenses, raised a $37M Series B at a $200M valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Micron plans to invest $7B over the next several years to expand its manufacturing footprint in Singapore, with a new HBM chip plant set to open in 2026 (Yuan Gao/Bloomberg)
NHTSA: software fixes accounted for 15% of US automotive recalls in 2024, up from 6% in 2019, as traditional carmakers struggle with managing software updates (Brooke Masters/Financial Times)
